short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block distracting websites on a per-window basis

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Blinds allows users to block websites on a per-window basis.  This allows those who use multiple virtual desktops to more easily organize and separate 'fun' and 'work' desktops.
